name: Bonkers Crabs
description:
This is for the weekly game jam 162. In bonkers crabs you have 3 songs to play and an endless mode. Jump right into it and play the first couple songs. This is just the demo for the jam so there are only 3 songs. I used scratch and it took a whole week.

Check out the original project:                                                                                                                          https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/417983232/
